00003 /*
00004  * slow_extract
00005  *
00006  * Extracts the slow control data (everything except the primary event ID 1)
00007  * from a MIDAS data file.
00008  */
00009 
00010 #include <stdio.h>
00011 #include <stdlib.h>
00012 
00013 #ifndef __CINT__
00014 #include "midas.h"
00015 #include "../../compress/mucap_compress.h"
00016 #endif

00029 bool get_input_event(FILE * fp, char *pevent, int event_number)
00030 {
00031     int event_size, size_read;
00032     EVENT_HEADER *header;
00033 
00034     size_read = fread(pevent, 1, sizeof(EVENT_HEADER), fp);
00035     if (size_read != sizeof(EVENT_HEADER))
00036         return !SUCCESS;
00037 
00038     header = (EVENT_HEADER *) pevent;
00039 
00040     if (event_number == 0 && header->trigger_mask != MIDAS_MAGIC) {
00041         fprintf(stderr, "Input is not a valid MIDAS file\n");
00042         exit(1);
00043     }
00044 
00045     event_size = header->data_size;
00046 
00047     if ((unsigned int) event_size >= MAX_EVENT_SIZE - sizeof(EVENT_HEADER)) {
00048         fprintf(stderr, "Invalid event size %d\n", event_size);
00049         exit(1);
00050     }
00051 
00052     size_read = fread(pevent + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER), 1, event_size, fp);
00053     if (size_read != event_size)
00054         return !SUCCESS;
00055 
00056     return SUCCESS;
00057 }

00067 void process_file(char *input_filename, int addr, int fadc)
00068 {
00069     FILE *input_fp;
00070     char *input_event;
00071     int event_number;
00072 
00073   hSamples = new TH2D("samples", "Sample profile", 8, -0.5, 7.5, 4096, -0.5, 4095.5);
00074   hPed0 = new TH2D("ped0", "Pedestal from first samples", 8, -0.5, 7.5, 4096, -0.5, 4095.5);
00075   hChannelNSample = new TH1D("channelNSample", "Number of samples vs. channel", 8, -0.5, 7.5);
00076   hChannelNIsland = new TH1D("channelNIsland", "Number of islands vs. channel", 8, -0.5, 7.5);
00077   hMinSample = new TH2D("minSample", "Minimum sample in island", 8, -0.5, 7.5, 8192, -0.5, 8191.5);
00078   hMaxSample = new TH2D("maxSample", "Maximum sample in island", 8, -0.5, 7.5, 8192, -0.5, 8191.5);
00079   hPulseEnergy = new TH2D("pulseEnergy", "Reconstructed energy of pulse", 8, -0.5, 7.5, 4000, 0.5, 12000.5);
00080 
00081   char host_name[256], exp_name[32];
00082   cm_get_environment(host_name, sizeof(host_name), exp_name, sizeof(exp_name));
00083   cm_connect_experiment(host_name, exp_name, "show_pulses", NULL);
00084    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00085    compress_load_all();
00086 
00087     /* Open input and output files */
00088     input_fp = fopen(input_filename, "rb");
00089     if (!input_fp) {
00090         fprintf(stderr, "Unable to open %s: ", input_filename);
00091         perror("");
00092         exit(1);
00093     }
00094 
00095     /* Allocate buffer to hold MIDAS event */
00096     input_event = (char *) malloc(MAX_EVENT_SIZE*2);
00097 
00098     /* Loop over MIDAS events */
00099     event_number = 0;
00100     while (get_input_event(input_fp, input_event, event_number) == SUCCESS) {
00101 
00102         EVENT_HEADER *header = (EVENT_HEADER *) input_event;
00103 
00104         if(header->event_id == 1) {
00105           expand_event(header+1, header+1);
00106           int stop = process_event(header + 1, addr, fadc);
00107           if(stop) break;
00108         }
00109 
00110         event_number++;
00111     }
00112 
00113     fclose(input_fp);
00114 }

00116 double findPulse(int nsamples, int *samples){
00117   int sig_length_counter = 0;
00118   double sig_max_height = 0.;
00119   int sig_first_index = 0;
00120   double sig_integral = 0.;
00121   int sig_over_thr = 0;
00122   
00123   bool hasOvershoot = false;
00124   bool hasUndershoot = false;
00125   const int kLengthThreshold = 4;
00126 
00127   // (Serdar) i increased nsamples to 40 (was 16)
00128 
00129   if(nsamples < 40 ) return 0.;
00130 
00131   // Let's first find the pedestal 
00132 
00133   // (Serdar) here i check whether selecting the first 5 sample or 10 sample do change anything
00134   // on the pedestal determination, see histograms histPeds0first05bins or 10bins for more info
00135   // and i find both can be used, so i select first 10 bins to get more info.
00136 
00137   const int pedSamples = 10;
00138   double pedestalOffset = 0;
00139   double sumpedestal2 = 0;
00140   double pedestalsigma = 0 ;
00141 
00142   if(pedSamples > nsamples) return 0.;
00143 
00144   for(int i = 0; i < pedSamples; i++) {
00145     pedestalOffset += samples[i];
00146   }
00147   pedestalOffset /= pedSamples;
00148 
00149   for(int i = 0; i < pedSamples; i++) {
00150     sumpedestal2 += (pedestalOffset-samples[i])*(pedestalOffset-samples[i]);
00151   }
00152   pedestalsigma= sqrt(sumpedestal2/pedSamples);
00153 
00154   // printf("Pedestal = %f\n", pedestalOffset);
00155   // Pedestal found, let's look for a pulse now
00156 
00157   // (Serdar) here i calculated the sigma for pedestal calculation, then i will start
00158   // searching the pulse if sample is bigger the 4 pedestal sigma,
00159 
00160   const int kThreshold = 4*pedestalsigma;
00161 
00162   for(int i = 0; i < nsamples; i++) {
00163     double bin_content = -1.*((double)samples[i] - pedestalOffset);
00164     
00165     double next_bin_content = 0.;
00166     if(i<nsamples-1) next_bin_content = -1.*((double)samples[i+1] - pedestalOffset);
00167 
00168     if(bin_content >= kThreshold || next_bin_content >= kThreshold){
00169       sig_length_counter++;
00170       sig_over_thr++;
00171       
00172       if (sig_length_counter == 1){
00173         sig_first_index = i;
00174         // inspect left shoulder of this pulse
00175         int back;
00176         for(back=i-1; back>=0; back--){
00177           double cont = -1.*((double)samples[back] - pedestalOffset);
00178 
00179           // (Serdar) here i made 2 changes, first, instead of 1/4 of the kThreshold
00180           // i have 3/4, which equals 3 sigma at the left shoulder
00181 
00182           if(cont > 3*kThreshold/4 && (i-back)<4){ 
00183             // accept it still as part of the left shoulder
00184             sig_length_counter++;
00185             sig_first_index = back;             
00186           }
00187           else break;
00188         }
00189       }
00190     }
00191     else{
00192       if (((bin_content < kThreshold) || (i == nsamples - 1)) && 
00193           (sig_over_thr >= kLengthThreshold)){
00194         // It's the end of the pulse, so let's include part of the right 
00195         // shoulder
00196         int forw;  // index for samples right of momentary position
00197         for(forw=i+1;forw<nsamples; forw++){
00198           double cont = -1.*((double)samples[forw] - pedestalOffset);
00199           if(cont > kThreshold/4 && (forw-i)<4){
00200             // accept it still as part of the left shoulder
00201             sig_length_counter++;
00202           }
00203           else break;  // probably pedestal so let's stop
00204           i = forw;
00205         }
00206         
00207         sig_integral = 0.;
00208         sig_max_height = 0.;
00209         
00210         for(int i = sig_first_index; i < sig_first_index+sig_length_counter; i++){
00211           double bin_content = -1.*((double)samples[i] - pedestalOffset);
00212           sig_integral += bin_content;
00213           if (bin_content > sig_max_height){
00214             sig_max_height = bin_content;
00215           }
00216         }
00217         
00218         // Let's only deal with one pulse at this time!!!
00219         break;
00220       }
00221     }
00222   }
00223 
00224 //  printf("Pulse accepted from sample %d to %d with energy %f\n", sig_first_index,
00225 //       sig_first_index+sig_length_counter, sig_integral);
00226 
00227   return sig_integral;
00228 }
00229 
00230 int processIsland(int t0, int nsamples, int *samples, int channel)
00231 {
00232   hChannelNIsland->Fill(channel);
00233 
00234   if(nsamples < 16) return 0;
00235 
00236   int minI = -1;
00237   int maxI = -1;
00238   int minSample = 4097;;
00239   int maxSample = -1;
00240 
00241   double energy = findPulse(nsamples, samples);
00242 
00243   for(int i = 0; i < nsamples; i++) {
00244     hSamples->Fill(channel, samples[i]);
00245     hChannelNSample->Fill(channel);
00246     if(samples[i] > maxSample) {
00247       maxI = i;
00248       maxSample = samples[i];
00249     }
00250     if(samples[i] < minSample) {
00251       minI = i;
00252       minSample = samples[i];
00253     }
00254     if(i<10){
00255       hPed0->Fill(channel, samples[i]);
00256     }
00257   }
00258 
00259   hMinSample->Fill(channel, minSample);
00260   hMaxSample->Fill(channel, maxSample);
00261   hPulseEnergy->Fill(channel, energy);
00262 
00263   return 0;
00264 }
00265 
00266 int process_event(void *pevent, int addr, int fadc)
00267 {
00268   for(int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
00269 
00270     if(i != fadc && fadc >= 0) continue;
00271 
00272     // get the bank
00273     char name[80];
00274     sprintf(name, "N%c%02x", 'a' + i, addr);
00275     unsigned char *raw;
00276     int bank_size = bk_locate(pevent, name, &raw);
00277     bank_size = bank_size / 10;
00278 
00279 #ifdef PRINT_SAMPLES
00280     printf("-------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n");
00281 #endif
00282  
00283     int islandSamples[8192];
00284     int islandNsamples = 0;
00285     int islandT0 = -1;
00286     bool firstIsland = true;
00287  
00288     // loop through words to build up "islands"
00289     int lastTimestamp = 0;
00290     for(int j = 0; j < bank_size; j++) {
00291 
00292       // data format:
00293       //
00294       //  bits 
00295       //  78-52       timestamp
00296       //  51-48       overflow
00297       //  47-36       sampleB0
00298       //  35-24       sampleA0
00299       //  23-12       sampleB1
00300       //  11-0        sampleA1
00301       int timestamp =  (raw[j*10+0] << 20) |
00302                        (raw[j*10+1] << 12) |
00303                        (raw[j*10+2] << 4) |
00304                        (raw[j*10+3] >> 4);
00305       bool overflowB0 = ((raw[j*10+3] & 0x08) != 0);
00306       bool overflowA0 = ((raw[j*10+3] & 0x04) != 0);
00307       bool overflowB1 = ((raw[j*10+3] & 0x02) != 0);
00308       bool overflowA1 = ((raw[j*10+3] & 0x01) != 0);
00309       int sampleB0 = (overflowB0 << 12) |
00310                      (raw[j*10+4] << 4) |
00311                      (raw[j*10+5] >> 4);  
00312       int sampleA0 = (overflowA0 << 12) |
00313                      ((raw[j*10+5] & 0xf) << 8) |
00314                      (raw[j*10+6]);  
00315       int sampleB1 = (overflowB1 << 12) |
00316                      (raw[j*10+7] << 4) |
00317                      (raw[j*10+8] >> 4);  
00318       int sampleA1 = (overflowA1 << 12) |
00319                      ((raw[j*10+8] & 0xf) << 8) |
00320                      (raw[j*10+9]);  
00321 
00322      if(timestamp < lastTimestamp) {
00323        printf("Time ordering error!\n");
00324      }
00325 
00326       if(timestamp != lastTimestamp + 1) {
00327         if(!firstIsland) {
00328           int stop = processIsland(islandT0*2, islandNsamples, islandSamples, i);
00329 #ifdef PRINT_SAMPLES
00330           printf("*\n");
00331 #endif
00332 
00333           if(stop) {
00334             return 1;
00335           }
00336         }
00337         islandT0 = timestamp; 
00338         islandNsamples = 0;
00339         firstIsland = false;
00340       }
00341       lastTimestamp = timestamp;
00342 
00343 #ifdef PRINT_SAMPLES
00344       printf("fadc=%d t=%d %d %d %d %d\n", i, timestamp, 
00345              sampleA1, sampleB1, sampleA0,sampleB0);
00346 #endif
00347 
00348       islandSamples[islandNsamples++] = sampleA1;
00349       islandSamples[islandNsamples++] = sampleB1;
00350       islandSamples[islandNsamples++] = sampleA0;
00351       islandSamples[islandNsamples++] = sampleB0;
00352     }
00353 
00354     if(islandNsamples != 0) {
00355       processIsland(islandT0*2, islandNsamples, islandSamples, i);
00356 #ifdef PRINT_SAMPLES
00357        printf("*\n");
00358 #endif
00359     }
00360   }
00361 
00362   return 0;
00363 }
